entry.title: ShutterBug
entry.summary:
Author: Iriley

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 126,517Chapters: 52/?Kudos: 1,406

Summary: Waking up Peter finds him self in a new city and no memory of how he got there. The question is, where is Gotham and how did he get there?Little does he know that his new photographer job will lead him to making new friend and maybe something more.Join Peter as he takes on Gotham and its rouges- not to mention finding his place as a spider in the mists of bats and birds. Another Peter in Gotham fic!

entry.title: Fatherhood - Year Two
entry.summary:
Author: Blue_Crow757

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,300Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 16

Summary: Seven years have passed since that fateful night when a tiny Kryptonian baby shook their world and rewrote their definition of family. Now, Clark and Bruce find themselves navigating the complex, beautiful chaos of raising Conner, now a curious, spirited seven-year-old, while preparing for new chapters ahead. Dick, their eldest, is stepping into adulthood, ready to face college and forge his own path far from Gotham. As Clark and Bruce’s relationship deepens, the possibility of marriage looms on the horizon, promising both hope and new challenges. But life doesn’t pause for plans, between parenthood, hero duties, and the ghosts of their pasts. But it’s nothing they can’t get through together.

entry.title: With All Due Respect
entry.summary:
Author: BlueGrapefruitSoda

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,981Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 125

Summary: Bruce gave a slight smile, his voice low and curiosity piqued. “You have permission to speak.” Clark shifted uncomfortably, his gaze dropping to the ground. “As someone who’s dedicated his life to your safety and happiness,” he began, his voice quiet but steady, “it matters deeply to me that you choose a partner truly worthy of you — someone who honors your love and your loyalty.” He drew in a slow breath, then lifted his eyes to meet Bruce’s. “And I’m afraid, my prince… the man you’re considering is not that person.”Or Clark is in love with Bruce, the prince he protects and Bruce is oblivious.
